metaTitle: Santa's lost button | The Christmas Elf
metaContent: Santa's lost buttons are of a high quality mirror effect gold finish and are hand sewn onto hand brushed material to look like Santa’s coat.

product.title: Santa's Lost Button
product.caption: Santa's Lost Button
info: Imagine your child’s face when they come downstairs on Christmas morning to find Santa has lost one of his buttons during the night !!!! The buttons are of a high quality mirror effect gold finish and are hand sewn onto hand brushed material to look like Santa’s coat.
product.smallPrint: Please note these are a keepsake and not a toy and care should be taken.
productInfo: The button comes wrapped in a cellophane bag with a Christmas sticker

inStockExtra: Please Note: The current dispatch time is 3 weeks
